txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Coarse furs from the beasts found throughout the northern North Downs. Deliver the items to Birgir Listmaster at Othrikar.
'Completed: A simple task to obtain coarse furs from beasts. We are grateful.'
'Fur makes good clothing liner. We could use some more if you are willing to collect the furs.'
Birgir Listmaker, one of the miners at Othrikar in the northern reaches of the North Downs, awaits the delivery of coarse furs.
Deliver the coarse furs to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar
You are on a task to deliver coarse furs from the beasts in the North Downs to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar. Othrikar is north of Esteld√≠n in the North Downs.
Wanted: Coarse furs from the beasts found throughout the northern North Downs.
